centralObject

类 Person

  • java.lang.Object
    • physicalObject.Friend
      • centralObject.Person
  • 所有已实现的接口:
    PhysicalObject

    public class Person
extends Friend
    作者:
    Shen

    • 构造器概要

      构造器 
      构造器和说明
      Person(java.lang.String name, int age, char sex)
      Constructor

    • 方法概要

      所有方法 实例方法 具体方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      boolean equals(java.lang.Object person)
      Two friends are equal only when they have the same name.
      int hashCode()
      Equality of friends only links with name, so hash code of friends can be name's hash code.

      • 从类继承的方法 physicalObject.Friend

        getDegree, getDirect, getName, getRaidus, getSpeed

      • 从类继承的方法 java.lang.Object

        getClass, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • 构造器详细资料

      • Person

        public Person(java.lang.String name,
              int age,
              char sex)
        Constructor
        参数:
        name - It should only consist of letters of an alphabet and contain no blank space or expression character.
        age - It should be a positive integer.
        sex - It should be either 'M' or 'F'. The former presents male and the latter presents female.

    • 方法详细资料

      • equals

        public boolean equals(java.lang.Object person)
        从类复制的说明: Friend
        Two friends are equal only when they have the same name.
        覆盖:
        equals 在类中 Friend

      • hashCode

        public int hashCode()
        从类复制的说明: Friend
        Equality of friends only links with name, so hash code of friends can be name's hash code.
        覆盖:
        hashCode 在类中 Friend
